name: Check Substrate - The surface must be clean, dry and free from all loose particles
Prepare surface to accept primer using a scraper or grinder and vacuum or sweep residual debris. Remove all sharp edges including screws, nails and concrete/mortar projections.
Dampen the surface that the membrane will be applied to.
Mixing and Application. Mix Enviro Hydrostatic 1 thoroughly using a mechanical mixer. Apply first coat of Enviro Hydrostatic 1 by brush, roller or spray.
Apply second coat of Enviro Hydrostatic 1 by brush, roller or spray. Achieve 1.0mm WFT and 1.5mm DFT.
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
